name: Bpht5
body:
### Welcome to BPHT5's GitHub Page.
This is where our source control, and file hosting will occur for the project BPHT5.  This Project is a LIVE DOCUMENT and there will be many new features added as soon as we can get the documentation built. 
[BPHT5 DEMO](http://bpht5.neocities.org/BP-Index.html)



### HTML Templates
While we want to be proud of 100% HTML compliance and buzzword bingo, but for now the focus has been on functionality and getting the components wrapped up in a manor I can release the tools, used to generate these templates.  The possibilities are endless with customization.  You will see many different use cases providing proper use of elements and providing an elegant UI.  There Are different templates, and not all the html files utilize the same appearance.  We are working on breaking up the UI points into themes for these templates, but it is a means to provide the end user with the tools needed to ignore the web design and focus on their project or documentation efforts.  

### Project Progress:
See: [BPHT5 Project](https://sites.google.com/a/jcsc.biz/bpht5/)
This is not a finalized solution, but you can track our progress, contribute, DONATE, and get updates at BPHT5.jcsc.biz  

### DONATE
You can help us grow, and thank us for solving your HTML woes with our templates and knowledge base by donating to jcsc.biz.  We are a non-profit Open Source Custom Hardware & Software Development Organization.  There are costs to get our efforts and projects to the community and simple small donations could radically change our ability to provide better services and functionality to the community.  Our time can always be purchased to solve your issues, but our efforts which can reduce the "reinventing the wheel" policy everyone seems to take, by solving small complex issues, and generating appropriate functionality, the rest is data which is supplied by the organization, and we created tangible working items we feel could revolutionize your project and how you educate | inform your community on your Project | Plan | Ideas which can help you grow, learn, and possibly have an oppertunity to give back to the community yourself.  We sincerely hope this project helps, and you should take some time and appreciate the effort it took to provide you with this revolutionary product.
~jcsc.biz
